summary: This is a preset for SweetFX, as popularized by ICBINE.
descriptionHtml:
I started out with a preset from one of those ICBINE versions. I can't remember which one any more. I edited it quite a bit. Uploaded by request. File includes everything you need for SweetFX, but if you're just updating to my version, all you need to replace is the SweetFX_settings.txt

This stuff goes in your base Skyrim folder (where skyrim.exe is), NOT the Data folder.
For more specific installation instructions, visit here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63839/?

Want to get rid of the black bars?
Under Choose Effects in SweetFX_settings, set USE_BORDER to 0.
Want to get rid of the film grain?
Under Choose Effects in SweetFX_settings, set USE_FILMGRAIN to 0.
Want to get rid of the vignette?
Under Choose Effects in SweetFX_settings, set USE_VIGNETTE to 0.

I personally use this with ENBOOST. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63839/?]More advanced instructions for use with ENBOOST and HialgoBoost are here. HEEERE. CLICK IT AND DON'T ASK ME QUESTIONS ABOUT STUFF THAT'S IN THE DESCRIPTION PLEASE.[/url]
author: Tiiria
